SecurityData.title: Anti-denial of service (DOS)
SecurityData.para: It protects the exchange from multiple requests sent to the server.

SecurityData.title: Jail Login
SecurityData.para: It deters the multiple failed attempts for a specific amount of time. As a result, it avoids unusual login attempts.

SecurityData.title: HTTP Authentication
SecurityData.para: This secures HTTP authentication tokens for user approvals.

SecurityData.title: Server-Side Request forgery protection
SecurityData.para: It keeps the system safe and avoids attacks that are sent from pregnable web sources.

SecurityData.title: HTTP Parameter Pollution Protection
SecurityData.para: Prevent the web attacks that create HTTP getting the information.

SecurityData.title: Anti-distributed denial of service
SecurityData.para: Protects the exchange in case an unexpected amount of traffic is coming from different sources.
